subject: Football
lead_paragraph: For the first time in a half-century, the N.F.L. draft will not be conducted in New York next year. Commissioner Roger Goodell said Thursday that the league was considering moving the draft to Chicago or Los Angeles in 2015.
snippet: For the first time in a half-century, the N.F.L. draft will not be conducted in New York next year. Commissioner Roger Goodell said Thursday that the league was considering moving the draft to Chicago or Los Angeles in 2015.
